headline: Cathie Wood Bets on a Crypto Stocks Rebound. Ark Goes Big on Coinbase, Bitmine, Others.
summary: Crypto stocks are on a terrible run but  Cathie Wood is intent on buying the dip.  Wood’s ARK funds loaded up on almost $50 million worth of shares in crypto-exposed companies, including crypto exchange  Coinbase  Ethereum treasury company  Bitmine Immersion Technologies  stablecoin issuer  Circle Internet Group  and CoinDesk owner  Bullish  according to a trade notification Monday.  Coinbase stock fell more than 6%, while Circle tumbled 9.6%, Bitmine plunged 11% and Bullish slipped 2.6%.

content.title: Cathie Wood Bets on a Crypto Stocks Rebound. Ark Goes Big on Coinbase, Bitmine, Others.

headline: Tesla Stock Broke Out But This Longtime Bull Decided To Take Profit
summary: Cathie Wood and Ark Invest continued to take some profit from its Tesla stock holdings on Monday, even as TSLA advanced above a traditional buy point in stock market action.  On Monday, Wood's ARK Innovation ETF and ARK Next Gen Internet ETF sold a combined 124,867 TSLA shares for an estimated $59.35 million, according to Wood's ETF daily trade disclosures.  The comes after Wood and her Ark Invest shaved their TSLA holdings last week, selling 87,993 shares on Friday.

headline: Tesla Stock Hits New Record High The Day After Longtime Bull Decided To Take Profit
summary: Tesla stock hit a fresh record high during Tuesday's stock market a day after Cathie Wood and Ark Invest continued to take some profits from their Tesla holdings.  On Monday, Wood's ARK Innovation ETF and ARK Next Gen Internet ETF sold a combined 124,867 TSLA shares for an estimated $59.35 million, according to Wood's ETF daily trade disclosures.  This comes after Wood and her Ark Invest shaved their TSLA holdings last week, selling 87,993 shares on Friday.

headline: Cathie Wood's ARK Invest Buys $59M in Crypto Stocks Amid Market Slide
summary: Cathie Wood’s ARK Invest went bargain hunting on Monday, deploying roughly $59 million into crypto equities as the sector faced a multi-day slide. The firm added to its massive positions in Coinbase, Circle, and Bullish. Is this the right time to buy the dip? CoinDesk's Jennifer Sanasie hosts "CoinDesk Daily."

headline: TAP Expands International Brokerage Connectivity Across Europe, the Middle East, Africa, Asia, and Latin America
summary: San Diego, CA, Dec. 16, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- TAP, Inc., an AI-driven, multi-asset investment and payments platform, today announced an expansion of international brokerage connectivity on the TAP Platform. Through new integrations with Questrade, Wealthsimple, Trading212, and Stake, TAP now enables users across multiple global markets to connect their existing brokerage accounts for consolidated portfolio viewing, research, and market insights within a single interface. Wood’s ARK funds loaded up on almost $50 million worth of shares in crypto-exposed companies, including crypto exchange  Coinbase  Ethereum treasury company  Bitmine Immersion Technologies  stablecoin issuer  Circle Internet Group  and CoinDesk owner  Bullish  according to a trade notification Monday.  Coinbase stock fell more than 6%, while Circle tumbled 9.6%, Bitmine plunged 11% and Bullish slipped 2.6%.
